body:
Hey guys, i recently made a little clan for me and my IRL friends on clash of clans but i thought you guys might want to join in! 
Search "Fruit Soap"
It should be the only one and my ign is mathew on clash of clans, and join! so yeah! Clan was just made :3
Have fun xD
